Plot: Berlin, the Romantic Era. Young poet Heinrich wishes to conquer the inevitability of death through love, yet is unable to convince his skeptical cousin Marie to join him in a suicide pact. ...
Title: Amour fou
Actors: Christian Friedel, Birte Schnoeink, Stephan Grossmann, Marc Bischoff
tomatoConsensus: Amour Fou risks overpowering its deceptively impactful story with its remarkable visuals, but ultimately forms a fascinating whole.
